issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.49.3rc15

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.reddit.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
When ads appear, the bottom widget often disappears. Caused by `reddit.com##div[style="margin-left:24px;margin-top:0"][class] > div[class] > div[class^="_"]:not([data-redditstyle]):has(div[data-before-content="advertisement"])`
2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![Screenshot from 2023-06-01 16-15-31](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/89158249/396501bb-4c74-462e-b2f2-3a46e1b9cdf2)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 2:</summary>

![Screenshot from 2023-06-01 16-15-36](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/89158249/02553d77-c6c8-491d-89cf-9002a55dcd82)


</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: Unfortunately so far, I haven't been able to reproduce. Though that filter seems a lot better since you removed the `:has` from it.

Unfortunately, the reported issue does not satisfy our [filters policy](https://kb.adguard.com/en/general/adguard-filter-policy). The website has low visitors.  Please add these rules to the User Rules:
```
echter.de###cookie_warning_overlay
echter.de###cookie_warning_underlay
```
